description: A workflow to wash a cat test entity using a finite-state machine model.
name: Wash_Cat_Test_Workflow

transitions.description: Begin the washing process for the cat test entity.
transitions.end_state_description: The cat test washing process has started.
transitions.name: start_washing_cat

transitions.description: Rinse the cat test entity after applying soap.
transitions.end_state_description: The cat test entity has been rinsed.
transitions.name: rinse_cat
transitions.start_state_description: The cat test washing process has started.

transitions.description: Dry the cat test entity after rinsing.
transitions.end_state_description: The cat test entity has been dried.
transitions.name: dry_cat
transitions.start_state_description: The cat test entity has been rinsed.

transitions.description: Complete the cat test washing process.
transitions.end_state_description: The cat test washing process is complete.
transitions.name: finish_washing_cat
transitions.start_state_description: The cat test entity has been dried.
